column1:
It is  significant to  note  that the  Petitioner had not  inquired 
from  the
Accused  driver,  any  details  such  as,  the  name  of the  hirer,  the  place  from
which the bricks are to be transported and up to which point the bricks are to

be  transported,  the  time  period, 
the  amount  for  the  hire  that  was  agreed

upon  etc.  Without  asking 
any  of these  questions  the  Petitioner  had  just
allowed the Accused driver to take the lorry.
